name: Scaredy Cat (RedTheDemonCat)
description:
Hello :)

This game works best with a mic/headset. The mic is quite finickey and the latency rate is quite bad. This was my first attempt at Unity's audio input system.

This game was developed for a University Project.
If there are any glitches, I appreciate them being reported to me <3

Developed in the Game Design III course, at the University of the Witwatersrand.
